feed.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin app bundle inclusion

entry.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin app bundle inclusion
entry.summary: Doug Huff is seeking permission from Laszlo to include his Info.plist and BitcoinAppIcon.icns in the upstream source repository, so that osx build can be automated without requiring external source requirements (outside of lib deps). It is unclear if the files are licensed under MIT or similar, or if Laszlo would be willing to put them in the Public Domain or other compatible license.
